Package games.stendhal.client.gui.map

Class MapPanelController

java.lang.Object
games.stendhal.client.gui.map.MapPanelController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameObjects.GameObjectListener, PositionChangeListener, StendhalClient.ZoneChangeListener
public class MapPanelController extends Object implements GameObjects.GameObjectListener, PositionChangeListener, StendhalClient.ZoneChangeListener
Controller object for the map panel.
